net.sourceforge.wurfl.core.request
Interface WURFLRequestFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWURFLRequestFactory
public interface WURFLRequestFactory

General interface of WURFLRequest Factory

To extends WURFLRequest is necessary also extending this interface to build custom WURFLRequest implementation

Method Summary
 WURFLRequest createRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest sourceRequest)
          Build a WURFLRequest instance from given request.
 WURFLRequest createRequest(String userAgent)
          Build WURFLRequest using given User-Agent.
 WURFLRequest createRequest(String userAgent, String xWapProfile)
          Build WURFLRequest using given User-Agent and X-WAP-Profile
 WURFLRequest createRequest(WURFLHeaderProvider headerProvider)
          Build WURFLRequest using given WURFLHeaderProvider
 

Method Detail

createRequest

WURFLRequest createRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest sourceRequest)
Build a WURFLRequest instance from given request. The sourceRequest class may change by deploy environment.

Parameters:
sourceRequest - A request object from which build custom WURFLRequest.
Returns:
A instance of WURFLRequest builded from sourceRequest.

createRequest

WURFLRequest createRequest(String userAgent)
Build WURFLRequest using given User-Agent.

Parameters:
userAgent - The user-agent used to build WURFLRequest.
Returns:
Built WURFLRequest.

createRequest

WURFLRequest createRequest(String userAgent,
                           String xWapProfile)
Build WURFLRequest using given User-Agent and X-WAP-Profile

Parameters:
userAgent - The user-agent used to build WURFLRequest.
xWapProfile - The X-WAP-Profile
Returns:
Built WURFLRequest.

createRequest

WURFLRequest createRequest(WURFLHeaderProvider headerProvider)
Build WURFLRequest using given WURFLHeaderProvider

Parameters:
headerProvider - The WURFLHeaderProvider instance
Returns:
Built WURFLRequest.
